name: places/ChIJ_fFs_5VYwokR2V4o4b3CEHM
formattedAddress: 103 E 80th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 103 E 80th St, New York, NY 10075-0305, USA

originalText.text:
1. Because I can’t go any lower. The doctor was a no-show to her appointment that was booked nearly 2 months ago. Doctors need to take responsibility for the patient’s investment and time & such callous attitude towards your patient’s health tells me more about this doctor than any skills she may claim to possess. Extremely disappointed.

I also hold Mount Sinai accountable for any miscommunications & scheduling issues, but from what I understand, the doctor just walked out the door, with no regard for the patient.

originalText.text: This is a review for Dr. Kolev and Mount Sinai.Upon entering the building I had to go into another room for insurance info and to pay my copay. I was then sent to her waiting area, where the front desk couldn't fine my appointment. Annoying, but the finally figured it out. I waited 30min in the exam room. I went to Dr. Kolev for a surgery consult. This is a major surgery that would be life changing so I came with MANY questions. I only made it through 5 questions and then she stopped me and said  "just email me the rest in mychart." and left the room. Very dismissive, so I knew she would not be my surgeon immediately. I then get a bill for my copay a few weeks later even though I already paid it and had a record of it. They were rude to me, but I thought it was handled. Now Mount Sinai sent my $50 "copay" to collections even though I have a record of payment and my insurance says I do not owe them anything else. Terrible hospital, and honestly really disappointing consult. I would considering editing this review if my incorrect debt situation is rectified by the hospital.

originalText.text:
Tamara should not have her license to practice.
One of my closest friends went to her for a
genuine health concern only to be dismissed in a
rude manner and receive a physically aggressive
exam. This kind of behavior is unacceptable,
especially for a job of this nature which can lead
to true trauma. I highly advise anyone seeking an
ob/gyn to avoid this person. Disappointing and
disgusting behavior.
